contest-event.event-date:
May 9, 1976 D Granada Band of the Year
Granada Band of the Year 0 Other
granada-band-of-the-year
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK From Arthur Taylor's book 'Brass Bands':
Grimethorpe and Fairey tied for first place. As previously agreed, the marks awarded by the television adjudicator were used to break the tie; Grimethorpe were therefore declared the 1976 champions.
Feb. 7, 2011, 12:48 a.m. Jan. 26, 2013, 9:21 p.m.
1 Grimethorpe Colliery Band Bryden Thompson
2 Fairey Band Kenneth Dennison
3 Cory Band Denzil Stephens
4 Brighouse and Rastrick Band Maurice Handford
5 Wingates Band Richard Evans
7 Sun Life Sidney Sager
Unknown Result City of Coventry Ray Farr
Unknown Result Hammonds Saltaire Geoffrey Whitham
Unknown Result Besses o' th' Barn Frank Bryce
